fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Paint over your target's house during the night. Besides you yourself, all their visitors will unknowingly target one of your target's neighbours instead, at random.
- Paint the town red during the night (literally). Everyone killed that night will have their role and will smeared by paint, leaving them obscured. Killing roles will know the roles of anyone they successfully killed. One use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can use multiple abilities per night.
